changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION collection.collection_get_next_id( collectionID int, amount int ) RETURNS TABLE ( low_reserved_id int, high_reserved_id int ) LANGUAGE sql AS $$ UPDATE collection.collection_sequence SET counter = counter + amount WHERE collection_id = collectionID RETURNING (SELECT (counter - amount + 1) AS low_reserved_id), (SELECT counter AS high_reserved_id) $$;
